definition: Czech/Czech Republic/abbr. for 捷克[Jie2 ke4]

sentences.english: First it was India's Tata Motors ( TTM) that bought Jaguar and Land Rover from Ford ( F) last year.
sentences.chinese: 早先是去年印度的塔塔汽車從福特買下了捷豹和路虎。

sentences.english: Hey, wouldn't it be worth it if it'll crush the Jags ?
sentences.chinese: 嘿如果能大敗捷豹隊難道不值得麼？

sentences.english: Also has one-off test with Jaguar.
sentences.chinese: 同時也是捷豹車隊的試車手。

sentences.english: People flock to the showrooms and buy.
sentences.chinese: 人們因此紛紛來到捷豹汽車展示廳去買車。
於是捷豹汽車的生產停止了。

sentences.english: You are giving me a brand new Jaguar and you don't want anything.
sentences.chinese: 你給我一輛嶄新的捷豹但不要回報。

sentences.english: It takes years to work through the overhanging supply of Jaguars.
sentences.chinese: 這需要好幾年的時間才能消化掉積壓着的捷豹汽車。

sentences.english: Jaguar Land Rover is in the midst of amajor sales push in China.
sentences.chinese: 捷豹陸虎公司在中國的銷售正在大大增加。

sentences.english: Jaguar, he stressed, did not commission the concept.
sentences.chinese: 他強調說，捷豹從不委託他人制造概念車。

sentences.english: Jaguar China reserves the right the change the content of this programme.
sentences.chinese: 捷豹中國保留改變項目內容的權力。

sentences.english: If Jaguars stop moving, the economy will stop.
sentences.chinese: 如果捷豹停止生產了，經濟將停滯。

pinyin: A1 er3 fa3 · Luo2 mi4 ou1

definition: Škoda, Czech Republic car manufacturer, a subsidiary of Volkswagen Group
